data.name: Btn_AddOrChangeBrokerUser
data.value: Change User Credentials...

data.name: Btn_RemoveBrokerUser
data.value: Remove User Credentials

data.name: Btn_StartBroker
data.value: Start R Remote Services

data.name: Btn_StopBroker
data.value: Stop R Remote Services

data.name: Text_AddOrChangeBrokerUser
data.value: Add or change credentials under which to run R Remote Services.

data.name: Text_RemoveBrokerUser
data.value: Removes the credentials used for the R Remote Services.

data.name: Text_RHostBrokerCredentials
data.value: R Remote Services Credentials

data.name: Text_RHostBrokerCredentialsDetail
data.value:
The credentials entered below will be used to start the R Remote Services.
If you choose to save the credentials monitor will automatically start the the R Remote Services process.

data.name: Text_StartBroker
data.value: Starts and monitors R Remote Services process.

data.name: Text_StopBroker
data.value: Stops the monitored R Remote Services process.

data.name: Error_CredUIFailedToLoad
data.value: CredUIPromptForWindowsCredentials failed to load. Error: {0}

data.name: Text_RHostBrokerCredentialsInvalidTryAgain
data.value:
The user could not be logged in on this machine, please try again.
The credentials entered below will be used to start the R Remote Services. If you choose to save the credentials monitor will automatically start the broker process.

data.name: Text_UseDifferentBroker
data.value: Use different user account to run the R Remote Services.

data.name: Info_DidNotFindSavedCredentails
data.value: R Remote Services is configured to run as a different user than the Monitor. R Remote Services user credentials were not found.

data.name: Error_CredentialData
data.value: Failed to parse credentials data. Win32 error {0}.

data.name: Error_UserNameParsing
data.value: Failed to parse user name with Win32 error {0}.

data.name: Info_TooManyLoginAttempts
data.value: Too many attempts adding user login credentials.

data.name: Error_AddOrChangeUserFailed
data.value: Add or change user credentials failed. Exception: {0}

data.name: Error_AutoRestartFailed
data.value: Auto restart failed , exception: {0}

data.name: Error_CredentialUnpackingFailed
data.value: User credential unpacking failed. Win32 error {0}.

data.name: Error_CredRetreiveFailed
data.value: Failed to retrieve credentials from Window Credential Manager. Win32 error {0}.

data.name: Error_CredSaveFailed
data.value: Credentials save failed with Win32 error {0}.

data.name: Error_LogOnAttemptFailed
data.value: Log on attempt failed, with Win32 error {0}.

data.name: Error_StartUpFailed
data.value: R Remote Services startup failed with exception: {0}

data.name: Error_StopBrokerFailed
data.value: R Remote Services could not be stopped. Exception: {0}

data.name: Info_BrokerAlreadyRunning
data.value: R Remote Services is already running, process id {0}.

data.name: Info_CredAttempt
data.value: Trying to acquire credentials, attempt {0}.

data.name: Info_CredRetreiveSucceeded
data.value: Successfully retrieved credentials from credential manager.

data.name: Info_CredSaveSucceeded
data.value: Credential save succeeded.

data.name: Info_CredUICredsReceived
data.value: User entered credentials.

data.name: Info_CredUIDismissed
data.value: User dismissed Credential UI without entering credentials.

data.name: Info_CredUnpacked
data.value: User credentials were successfully unpacked.

data.name: Info_LogOnAttemptSucceeded
data.value: Log on attempt succeeded.

data.name: Info_NewBrokerInstanceStarted
data.value: New R Remote Services instance started, process id {0}.

data.name: Info_RemovedCredentials
data.value: Removed credentials from credential manager.

data.name: Status_BrokerStarted
data.value: R Remote Services process started, process Id: {0}

data.value: R Remote Services process stopped.
